name: European Passenger Transport Operators
goal: EPTO is the association of European Passenger Transport Operators and represents one of the leading transport services organisations in Europe, whose members are the nine largest public transport companies in Europe: Arriva, First Group, Go-Ahead, Grupo Barraqueiro, Keolis, National Express and Stagecoach. Members operate a fleet of nearly 75.000 vehicles, employ nearly 250,000 people and carry 12 billion passengers every year.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: liberalisation, fair market conditions, state aid
